Text.Page:
This lab report looks like it was written by Dakuryon himself.

"Lab Report ADE-1025
I have successfully tested my machine. I can now inject raw power into living flesh. But the process uses catalyst at an incredible rate...far more than I have on hand.

But as it turns out, I have found that the corpses of powerful beings provide a functional substitute. I need not personally harvest the ingredients necessary to create my catalysts (a drudgeworthy task). Now I can simply take what I need from the dead..."
